comment: This T-shirt I got for christmas has given me an identity crisis . I asked for it ironically . Cause it is so crappy . Like the thing a bunch of Bogan dad's would were . All dad wear from places like kinda suck . But I realised <URL>

comment: that no one who sees me in public except people who know me , know I am wearing this ironically . To them I am another Bogan dad . Which turns me into the thing I was having a dig at . Which is in itself , ironic . And this is the cause of my crisis .
